text: Ludwig Güttler (born 13 June 1943) is an internationally known German virtuoso on the baroque trumpet, the piccolo trumpet and the corno da caccia. As a conductor, he founded several ensembles including the chamber orchestra Virtuosi Saxoniae. His name is sometimes written in English as Ludwig Guttler. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Corno da caccia (1993) * La Caccia: Music Of The Hunt (1996) ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:German musicians Category:Trumpeters
title: Ludwig Güttler
